subject: Make complexity thresholds configurable
description:
Move hardcoded ELITE thresholds to configuration:
- Current: `ELITE_THRESHOLDS = { balanced: 0.25, deep: 0.55 }`
- Add to VoiceNexusConfig: `complexity: { balancedThreshold, deepThreshold }`
- Create `setComplexityThresholds(thresholds)` API
- Persist user preferences to session storage
- Allow runtime adjustment without restart
